nodes.text: The Ryoone campaign was a month-long string of engagements fought on Ryoone during the Galactic Civil War.
After the Battle of Endor, Churhee's Riflemen continued to fight the Galactic Empire with the support of the New Republic Army.

This collaboration had its most celebrated public exposure during a month-long string of engagements on the planet of Ryoone. During the campaign, Churhee's Riflemen fought against the Empire's Lightning Squadron.

After the New Republic captured Coruscant, Churhee's Riflemen no longer felt comfortable working for those in the seat of galactic power. The Riflemen returned to Turcan III, where they had fought their greatest battle, and once again began hiring themselves out as a mercenary company.
